content:
When user unsubscribe from private stream, "subscribe" button should disappear. And it does. But the check mark button :check_mark: (left side of stream list names in green if subscribed to stream) do not disappear. It also allows user to click.
From quoting this comment on github thread by user:

Go to stream settings, and hover over the left the invite only stream, a partially faded check mark will appear. Clicking will try to join the stream, but fail. Maybe this option should be removed, too, or give a more precise error message (like "Admins can only join this stream by invite").

We can hide the check mark, or disable it and show :not_allowed: symbol when user hover over the button. Which solution make more sense?
good observation! I think :not_allowed: is a great solution, as well as changing the error message.
